author: Mike Vilensky
title: GOP Challenger to New York Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand Declares Candidacy
text:
A Republican Party fundraiser and private-equity executive, Chele Chiavacci Farley, on Thursday declared she is running against Sen. Kirsten Gillibrand, the first high-profile GOP challenger to the popular New York Democrat. 
“New Yorkers won’t be taken advantage of anymore,” Ms. Farley said in a kickoff video. If elected, she said she would focus on investing in the state’s roads and transit systems.
